title: Can't Type Slash
description: Users can't type slash without invoking the command drop down menu. Users should be able to type "/" in their editor by hitting escape key to get out of the drop down menu, or pressing space key after the "/". GitHub issue #27

title: Add People UX
description: On the right panel people card I can't add new people. Need the ability to add new people if a search match doesn't exist. Just like in the mentions list in the editor. GitHub issue #26

title: Header Date Link Bug
description: Two issues: 1) the date is displaying the last modified date instead of created date, 2) clicking on the date always opens today's page instead of the daily page corresponding to that date. GitHub issue #25
